content: Well the problem is why she would unmask them in the first place? Her job was one of top management, not an investigator. Top managers do not conduct their own personal; investigations, they tell other people to do them. But in this case Rice took it upon herself to conduct several investigations of only Trump people and decided to unmask them and then generate reports that were handed to the media. Leaking high level classified information is in fact a crime, and we are supposed to believe only the private investigation of Rice was leaked as a coincidence?
